articles.author: Harry Brady
articles.description: If we have £5m to spend on the midfield, and the manager plays 3 in the middle and we already have 4 “1st team ready” midfielders, then spend all £5m on one player.  If you spend that £5m on 3 players when there’s one spot, none get the requisite game time, none will develop, and you have just wasted £5m.
